addonDesc.message: Hiki tatau ʻa e tab URLs ko e hyperlinks pe fakamatala mahinongofua

selectaction.message: Fokotuʻu e meʻa lomi mausi hono tolu

cpyalllnk.message: Ngaahi ʻuluʻitohi kotoa ko ha ngaahi fehokotakiʻanga

cpyalltxt.message: Ngaahi ʻuluʻitohi kotoa ko e text URLs

cpysellnk.message: Ngaahi ʻuluʻitohi kuo fili ko ha ngaahi fehokotakiʻanga

cpyseltxt.message: Ngaahi ʻuluʻitohi kuo fili ko e text URLs

cpytabtxt.message: Ko e tab ko ʻeni ko e text URL

cpytablnk.message: Ko e tab ko ʻeni ko ha fehokotakiʻanga

cpyalllnknp.message: Ngaahi ʻuluʻitohi kotoa ko ha ngaahi fehokotakiʻanga (✂️)

cpyalltxtnp.message: Ngaahi ʻuluʻitohi kotoa ko e text URLs (✂️)

cpysellnknp.message: Ngaahi ʻuluʻitohi kuo fili ko ha ngaahi fehokotakiʻanga (✂️)

cpyseltxtnp.message: Ngaahi ʻuluʻitohi kuo fili ko e text URLs (✂️)

cpytabtxtnp.message: Ko e tab ko ʻeni ko e text URL (✂️)

cpytablnknp.message: Ko e tab ko ʻeni ko ha fehokotakiʻanga (✂️)

tip1.message: The active tab is always selected

tip2.message: Hold the CTRL key to select additional tabs

tip3.message: Hold SHIFT key to select a range of tabs

tip4.message: You can set custom shortcuts for all copy actions

tip5.message: All actions can also be found in the tab context menu

tip6.message: You can disable this popup in the addons preferences page

tip7.message: Use the middle mouse button to invoke the direct action

tip8.message: Set the direct copy action in the toolbar buttons context menu

tip9.message: Give the developer some feedback so he'll know whats good and what needs impovement
